title: [Update: Full rollout] YouTube Music refreshes ‘Mixed for you’ covers w/ album art and artist profiles
content:
The automatically curated My Mix section sometimes labeled “Mixed for you” in YouTube Music appears to be getting updated cover art for some users.

more…

The post [Update: Full rollout] YouTube Music refreshes ‘Mixed for you’ covers w/ album art and artist profiles appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Google is tweaking YouTube Music's Mixed for you playlists to include album art and artist profiles in the covers for the playlists.
